title: These PC fans took almost a decade to make, but they might be worth the wait
description: Noctua is finally ready to talk about its new 140mm fan, and it sounds like it could become an absolute hit -- but it's not going to be cheap.

title: Wildfire smoke prompts Google to issue work-from-home advisory
description: Google has told its employees in the north-east of the U.S. to work from home in order to limit their exposure to wildfire smoke drifting in from Canada.
